reviews.review: but this game can be better then now
There are a lot of cheaters, there are almost no bugs, and I also have a friend named Gregor
Gra ma swoje plusy i minusy. Jednym z minusów jest gra z graczami którzy trolują grę. Plusów natomiast jest więcej a jednym z nich jest rozwój swojego refleksu bądź poznawania nowych znajomości.
The game still have a lot of problems with hacks.. and this makes the gameplay less fun, still, I would recommend to play with friend make the game more fun.
This game is really good but cheaters sucks

Gra jest niesamowicie dobra, posiada ona niesamowitą fizykę broni, system rang oraz różne dodatkowe tryby, z czasem od czasu do czasu są wszelakie eventy! Jeżeli jesteś osobą która panuje pod presją i jest cierpliwa, to gra dla ciebie!
Its a game for cheaters, noob, pro, and i (pro player)
Game infested with cheaters and game developer doesn't do anything about it. Just sad since the game will never reach the potential it has due to lack of anti cheating.

This game lies. It lies about quality of the MM games (most likely, you will play against ragebot or same person in your team, but that is more rare situation)
It lies about system specialization (Even if you have 4 GB RAM memory - it will crash)
It lies about updates - even if there's no changing to graphic part in changelog - they are already accepted.
10\10 from 2012 to 2016. And 0\primehackers for now
cok hile var bok gibi hile acıp vac ban yedim sonra yeniden hesap acıp ban yedim ve bu döngü sonsuza kadar sürecek oçlar

Jogo excelente para jogar com os amigos, principalmente em mix fechado.
Porém os comp's são meio desagradavéis, resumidamente, tem muitos cheater's hoje em dia, eu recomendo jogarem em servidores como a GamersClub ou FACEIT, onde o AntiCheat não permite tantas trapaças.
Daria nota 8 pelo game, porém, pelo número de hacker's que existem hoje em dia eu deixo a nota como 6,5.
Recomendo, porém apenas a versão paga, a versão de graça é impossivel jogar e se divertir.
